reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and appreciate its stretchiness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful stretchy sequin dress
items.body: The dress was beautiful! Received so many compliments. I'm gonna order in other colors. You can size down with this one as it is stretchey. Sequins maybe a little bothersome around the neck straps but not horrible. Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down 2 sizes
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Dress runs big. I would've needed to size down 2 sizes. I'm a solid size 18 in dresses with 44 bust 38 waist 50 hips. I thought that's what I ordered but I was mistaken in my video. I ordered a size 16 which shocked me because the dress fit bulky on me. So maybe the 14 would've worked better. They give you the option for custom sizing but I didn't want to do that because I wouldn't be able to return the dress if I didn't like it. The dress itself is made well. It has a proper waistline in it, the shaping is nice, the sequins feel nice with only a hint of scratchiness to it, and the inside lining is soft on skin. Dress had a decent weight to it but not heavy and it had a little stretch to it. Zipper quality was good. I was disappointed in the velvet as you really couldn't tell it had velvet underneath. Since the dress was too big, I really didn't like the neckline on me. It looked very lazy on. I wanted to love the dress but sizing was off. Would I recommend the dress? Maybe. I'd highly suggest sizing down 2 sizes if you want your figure to show & you don't want a bulky neckline. But be advised, returning the dress was a big hassle. Read more
items.author: Penniedee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!!!
items.body: Super cute and comfortable! I bought this for a work party and it was perfect. The dress was nicer than expected, the material is stretchy, sparkly, the length was perfect, I usually need to get the length adjusted, just loved the way it fits! Read more
items.author: bad situation

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy, Comfortable and Cute
items.body: Looks just the photo! The material is stretchy and soft, which means no awkward zipper battles (thank you, fashion gods ðŸ™Œ). It slips on easily, hugs in all the right places, and somehow still feels breathable. Itâ€™s one of those dresses you can wear all night â€” from dinner to dancing â€” without ever needing to adjust or tug. Read more
items.author: Isis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say yes to the dress!!
items.body: Wonderful dress!! The material is a great quality and made wearing the dress very comfortable. The tasteful shimmer was beau and the item appeared as advertised. There is a lot of stretch, making dancing, sitting, and standing a breeze. The dress is very well made and is not at all see through. This simple, yet elegant dress is a must have!! It still looked amazing and I would definitely order this again. Read more
items.author: Shannon Abbott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: This as such a pretty dress! I bought this & another by this brand with intent to send one back but I loved them both so much I kept them both. It fit true to size, was very comfortable to wear yet very nice for a wedding party. I did have to pin the chest area as it didnâ€™t cover well but otherwise was perfect! I would definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Mermaid Evening One Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Mermaid Evening One Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gold, Gray, Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Fuchsia, Hot Pink, Black, Champagne, Navy Blue, Dusty Rose, Light Blue, Red, Lilac. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
